tool_description: Creates comprehensive audit records for all inventory transactions with user actions, timestamps, and change details for compliance and tracking purposes.

transaction_id.description: Unique identifier for the transaction being audited

action_type.description: Type of action performed: create, update, delete, transfer, adjust

user_id.description: Identifier of user who performed the action

entity_type.description: Type of entity affected: item, location, movement, adjustment

entity_id.description: Identifier of the specific entity affected

old_values.description: Previous values before change in format 'field:value'

new_values.description: New values after change in format 'field:value'

ip_address.description: IP address from which action was performed

error_messages: Invalid action type: Must be one of [create, update, delete, transfer, adjust]
Invalid entity type: Must be one of [item, location, movement, adjustment]
User not found: The specified user_id does not exist
Transaction not found: The specified transaction_id does not exist
Invalid value format: Old and new values must be in 'field:value' format
usage: Provide transaction_id, action_type, user_id, entity_type, and entity_id. Optionally include old_values, new_values, reason_code, and ip_address for complete audit information.

audit_id.description: Unique identifier for this audit record

timestamp.description: When the audit record was created in ISO 8601 format
